scenarios.text: A neighboring tribe discovers fire and celebrates their newfound power.

choices.text: Replace their firewood with damp logs to trigger a 'fire curse' panic.
Whisper to their warriors that fire is best stored inside their huts.

scenarios.text: A mammoth migration offers a chance for a grand hunt.

choices.text: Lead hunters into a fake 'holy mammoth graveyard' filled with traps and conveniently placed bones.
Teach the tribe’s elders that mammoth meat spoils unless cooked with toxic berries.

scenarios.text: A rival priesthood rises in popularity, threatening the pharaoh’s cult.

choices.text: Accuse the rival priests of performing sacrilegious ceremonies with mummified cats.
Forge divine omens predicting the Nile will dry up unless the rival priests are exiled.

scenarios.text: A drought causes unrest among the common people.

choices.text: Spread rumors that the pharaoh is secretly hoarding water in his tomb.
Sell 'blessed' water jars at exorbitant prices, claiming they bring rain.

scenarios.text: The Great Fire of Rome burns uncontrollably.

choices.text: Encourage rumors that Christians started the fire to anger the gods.
Spread forged edicts claiming Nero plans to rebuild the city as his private palace.

scenarios.text: Grain shortages are leading to unrest in the streets.

choices.text: Secretly sabotage grain shipments and frame local merchants for hoarding.
Sell cheap, moldy bread laced with hallucinogenic seeds.

scenarios.text: A charismatic preacher gathers a crowd to join the First Crusade.

choices.text: Convince him to demand outrageous donations, ensuring chaos among the poor.
Forge divine messages promising salvation to anyone who burns their village and leaves immediately.

scenarios.text: A lord attempts to gather support for a peaceful truce across the continent.

choices.text: Spread rumors that he is secretly worshipping Satan.
Hire bandits to raid his lands disguised as his troops.

scenarios.text: A town tries to quarantine itself against the plague.

choices.text: Sneak infected rats into their granary under the guise of delivering 'blessed wheat.'
Spread rumors that the town’s mayor bathes in plague victim blood to protect himself.

scenarios.text: A wandering preacher claims the plague is God’s punishment.

choices.text: Forge divine letters demanding he single out specific wealthy families.
Offer to 'purify' the preacher’s audience by dousing them in plague-infested water.

scenarios.text: Accusations of witchcraft spread in Salem.

choices.text: Forge evidence of broomstick sales by prominent townsfolk.
Sell 'witch-repellent' charms made from poisonous herbs.

scenarios.text: A merchant caravan is rumored to be cursed.

choices.text: Spread tales that their goods are haunted, inciting mobs.
Buy their 'cursed' goods and resell them to rival towns under fake names.

scenarios.text: Trench warfare drags on, and morale among soldiers is dangerously low.

choices.text: Circulate fake letters from loved ones blaming soldiers for the war’s misery.
Introduce 'experimental' rations laced with mind-altering substances.

scenarios.text: A secret meeting is planned to negotiate a ceasefire.

choices.text: Leak the meeting’s location to an enemy artillery unit.
Forge a declaration of surrender and distribute it to the frontline troops.

scenarios.text: A viral video exposes a politician using AI-generated speech.

choices.text: Spread doctored videos of the politician confessing to fake crimes.
Forge documents proving the AI software belongs to a rival political party.

scenarios.text: Social media trends promote conspiracy theories about a vaccine.

choices.text: Plant fake studies linking the vaccine to bizarre side effects like green skin.
Create bots to amplify divisive debates, destabilizing communities.

scenarios.text: A hacktivist group exposes corporate exploitation in megacities.

choices.text: Fabricate footage showing the group working for a rival corporation.
Release heavily augmented raccoons with induced cyberpsychosis into the area, creating urban havoc.

scenarios.text: A new brain-computer interface claims to enhance cognition but has hidden side effects.

choices.text: Upload subliminal chaos-inducing messages into the software update.
Modify the interface to randomly display false emergency alerts, sowing panic.

scenarios.text: A rogue AI faction threatens to crash the central simulation.

choices.text: Leak the faction’s plans as a 'test' to confuse the population.
Introduce a virus to glitch the faction's avatars into chaos-inducing forms.

scenarios.text: A resource war breaks out over energy allocation to simulations.

choices.text: Forge data suggesting some simulations are 'redundant,' turning factions against each other.
Introduce a subroutine that drains resources while pretending to be a critical system.
